messages: 8693d0ffbaee22d508d4355afac92bd8 (17:38): hey all, is it possible to have a paragraph with left & right aligned spans without float?
a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:38): not that I can think of
423b8ccb769f5c7b7ecf265741fc9497 (17:39): why not use float ?
8693d0ffbaee22d508d4355afac92bd8 (17:39): pierroo: floating the p causes layout problems because it occurs inside the main content div

a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:39): I suppose you could have two lines, align one left, align one right, set a maximum width of 50% on each, and move the bottom one up half a line and the top one down
a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:39): robertj: put overflow: auto; on any element which contains floats
a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:40): this will magic fix many problems
8693d0ffbaee22d508d4355afac92bd8 (17:41): doesn't appear magically fixed; )
a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:41): Oh well, first time for everything
a4892d487aa520c76d2bfa7fc4610b0a (17:42): put clear: both; on the element after it maybe
8693d0ffbaee22d508d4355afac92bd8 (17:42): nope ;)
8693d0ffbaee22d508d4355afac92bd8 (17:42): lemme try the other 50% solution
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (17:51): justed wanted to spam a new directory i created: http://www.cssdirectory.net/
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (17:51): i'd like it if you guys submitted your favourite url's :)
3d85dcdee274f0991aa6ec42944acf98 (17:51): !v http://www.cssdirectory.net/
c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (17:51): HTML: Not valid - Errors: 5, http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http://www.cssdirectory.net/
c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (17:52): CSS: Valid - Warnings: 36, http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator?uri=http://www.cssdirectory.net/
3d85dcdee274f0991aa6ec42944acf98 (17:52): I ain't surfing no unvalid site!
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:00): !v http://www.cssdirectory.net/
c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (18:00): HTML: Valid - http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=http://www.cssdirectory.net/
c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (18:00): CSS: Valid - Warnings: 36, http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator?uri=http://www.cssdirectory.net/
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:00): surf it then
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:02): Alth: why not contributing to Demoz ?
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:03): s/Demoz/Dmoz
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:03): well ever tried to become an editor there? :)
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:03): http://dmoz.org/Computers/Data_Formats/Style_Sheets/CSS/
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:03): it's almost impossible :)
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:04): and i'd like this to be quicker too
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:04): as in review pages on a daily basis
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:04): open a wiki then
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:04): because i want reviewed pages
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:04): not everything
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:06): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cascading_Style_Sheets isn't enough ?
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:06): completely different
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:06): Alth: why so ? why do you refuse the right to review contributor to dmoz but be your own reviewer ?
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:07): ow i'm not saying i want to be sole reviewer
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:07): Alth: the bottom of the article is full of links
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:07): i've noticed though that it's very hard to get into dmoz
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:07): Alth: so, what the difference between you and dmoz...
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:07): ok, you're easier
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:08): yeah and it's slow
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:08): takes months
75e98afca7b6e3528f33051e03ee5e07 (18:09): there is so much websites about CSS nowadays that I'm not very excited about another initiative...
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:09): well what i wanted to do is not create another website about it
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:09): but a directory of all the websites about it
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:09): so it's easier to find stuff
189edbf28f3da1f5bf29efe53c42687b (18:10): Alth well that exists as well, sites such as digg and cssbeauty, but if you think you can do a good job on it, go ahead
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:11): i think i can :)
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:15): anyone know the trick to getting firefox to display the webdings font?
49ec94fc4c90faefd08e2ce20017e132 (18:16): May I ask why you're using the font and not an image?
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:17): andrew_: i have a mac
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:17): the same image, to download, can be several times that in size
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:17): i don't have webdings
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:17): what will i see on your site? :)
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:18): this is a site for windows users specifically
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:18): what's it about?
49ec94fc4c90faefd08e2ce20017e132 (18:18): andrew_: It'll break search results completely.
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:18): PseudoPlacebo: hows that?
49ec94fc4c90faefd08e2ce20017e132 (18:18): The spider will interpret A as A.
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:18): Alth: google Kapsules, windows only software
49ec94fc4c90faefd08e2ce20017e132 (18:18): "Blah blah blah blah A"
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:19): PseudoPlacebo: that's fine
49ec94fc4c90faefd08e2ce20017e132 (18:19): I guess.
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:19): meh. 7 bugs in bugzilla for this with no progress
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:19): confirmed ones?
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:20): this one is actually assinged to a moz dev it seems https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=194560
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): hehe no work on it
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): i don't think that'll be fixed very fast
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): read the comments
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): David Baron:
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): We don't support font downloading, and I'd hope any mechanism we support in the
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): future would allow assignment of glyphs into the PUA if needed.  Until that
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): point, any access of glyphs by index is non-portable, and non-portable things
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:22): don't belong on the web.  Period.
f2e6cd883181ea391111715a2bddf272 (18:23): i think he's right :)
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:30): how can i make a table column as small as possible without giving it an explicit width
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:32): there is ofcourse content in the column
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:32): is this a <table> or a <div> recreation?
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:32): table cells are by default sized to content
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:33): i have the table width set to 100%
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:33): i want the first col to be as small as possible
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:34): as small as the content within
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:35): with a table at 100% i dunno
25b5374f6d92b089afe3b07346106404 (18:35): make the last column width=100% is about all that comes to mind
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:36): i just found something on the intarweb
8a7031d3b2242241abd831e705c7ff32 (18:36): width:auto; for the small column; width:99% for the other column like you said :) thanks
